code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient complains of recurrent Body Aches over the past month. he is a male handyman aged 62 ys. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 85.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient presents with Body Aches x 4 days. pt is a male aged 62 Ys. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 84.7 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CRP, ANA, anti-CCP.

s:62 yo white M handyman presents with Body Aches. denies any alcohol use smokes one pack/day o:Height 170 cm, Weight 86.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 62, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed capsaicin 0.025% - 60 g topical, 3-4 x per day to affected area(s), and ordered CRP, ANA, anti-CCP.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use smokes one pack/day
